================================
# 21: Megresh Scally <109/109 HP, 19 temp> (AC 16, Hunter's Mark [59.9 minutes], Marking Target [59.9 minutes])
  21: SP3 <Healthy>

  14: Sydoris Larksson <77/80 HP> (AC 17, Aura of Protection)

   5: CC1 <Dead> (Marked [60.0 minutes], Vow of Enmity [9 rounds], Sapped [until start of Artorious Knights's next turn], Wounded [60.0 minutes], Paralyzing Breath Used, Summon Specters Used)``` ```-----COMBAT ENDED-----```
Pinned a message.

Everyone roll for initiative!
If you have a character set up with SheetManager: `!init join`
If it's a 5e monster: `!init madd <monster name>`
Otherwise: `!init add <modifier> <name>`
Messages sent in this channel during combat will be recorded for research purposes. By sending messages in this channel during this combat, you agree to participate in the Avrae NLP study. See `!init nlp` for more information.

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You radiate a protective, unseeable aura in a 10-foot Emanation that originates from you. The aura is inactive while you have the Incapacitated condition.

You and your allies in the aura gain a bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum bonus of +1) as well as Immunity to the Frightened Condition. If a Frightened ally enters the aura, that condition has no effect on that ally while there.

embeds.title: Megresh Scally casts Hunter's Mark!

fields.name: Meta
fields.value: **Effect**: Marked

fields.name: Megresh Scally
fields.value: **Effect**: Marking Target [60.0 minutes] (Attack: Marked Target; Attack: Shift Hunter's Mark; Parent: Hunter's Mark)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You magically mark one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. You also have Advantage on any Wisdom (Perception or Survival) check you make to find it.

If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action to move the mark to a new creature you can see within range.

fields.name: CC1
fields.value: **Damage**: 1d10 (3) [superiority] = `3`

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority die to maneuver one of your comrades into a more advantageous position. You add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll, and you choose a friendly creature who can see or hear you. That creature can use its reaction to move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks from the target of your attack.

embeds.title: Valcius Halcyon casts Hunter's Mark!

fields.name: Valcius Halcyon
fields.value: **Effect**: Marking Target [60.0 minutes] (Attack: Marked Target; Attack: Shift Hunter's Mark; Parent: Hunter's Mark)

fields.name: CC1
fields.value: **Effect**: Marked [60.0 minutes] (Parent: Marking Target)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You magically mark one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. You also have Advantage on any Wisdom (Perception or Survival) check you make to find it.

If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action to move the mark to a new creature you can see within range.

embeds.title: Valcius Halcyon attacks with Azurevein!

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
**Sword of Wounding.**: When you hit a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, the target takes an extra 2d6 Necrotic damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be unable to regain Hit Points for 1 hour. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

**Radiant Strikes.**: Your strikes now carry supernatural power. When you hit a target with an attack roll using a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike, the target takes an extra 1d8 Radiant damage.

**Sap.**: If you hit a creature with Azurevein, that creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

fields.name: Hunterâ€™s Mark
fields.value: Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. You also have Advantage on any Wisdom (Perception or Survival) check you make to find it.  (`free-rules`)

embeds.title: Valcius Halcyon uses Vow of Enmity!

fields.name: Meta
fields.value: **Effect**: Vow of Enmity

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
When you take the Attack action, you can expend one use of Channel Divinity to utter a vow of enmity against a creature you can see within 30 ft. You have Advantage on attack rolls against that creature for 1 minute or until you use this feature again. 
If the creature drops to 0 HP, you can transfer the vow to a different creature within 30 ft.

embeds.title: Sydoris Larksson uses Sneak Attack!

fields.name: Meta
fields.value:
**DC**: 16
DEX Save
**Damage Type**: piercing
**Effect**: Prone (Attack Disadvantage; Stand Up)
**Damage**: 2d6 (**1**, 5) [magical piercing] = `6`

fields.name: Cunning Strike: Trip (Cost: 1d6)
fields.value: If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the Prone condition.

fields.name: Sneak Attack
fields.value:
You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack roll if you have Advantage on the roll and the attack uses a Finesse or a Ranged weapon. The extra damage's type is the same as the weapon's type.

You don't need Advantage on the attack roll if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the target, the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition, and you don't have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

fields.name: Cunning Strike
fields.value:
You can forgo Sneak Attack Dice for the following effects using ``-choice``.

Poison (1d6), Trip (1d6), Withdraw (1d6)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: The collector calls up the enslaved spirits of those it has slain; 1d4 specters (without Sunlight Sensitivity; see the Monster Manual) arise in unoccupied spaces within 15 feet of it. The specters act right after the collector on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the collector is destroyed.

fields.value: **Effect**: Spiritual Guardians [10.0 minutes] (Attack: Spread the Spirit Guardians (Radiant); Attack: Spread the Spirit Guardians (Necrotic); Parent: Spirit Guardians)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
Protective spirits flit around you in a 15-foot Emanation for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.
When you cast this spell, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it. Any other creatureâ€™s Speed is halved in the Emanation, and whenever the Emanation enters a creatureâ€™s space and whenever a creature enters the Emanation or ends its turn there, the creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 Radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 Necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
**Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.** The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 3.

fields.name: Meta
fields.value: **Effect**: Marked

fields.name: Megresh Scally
fields.value: **Effect**: Marking Target [60.0 minutes] (Attack: Marked Target; Attack: Shift Hunter's Mark; Parent: Hunter's Mark)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You magically mark one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. You also have Advantage on any Wisdom (Perception or Survival) check you make to find it.

If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action to move the mark to a new creature you can see within range.

embeds.title: Valcius Halcyon uses Vow of Enmity!

fields.name: RE6
fields.value: **Effect**: Vow of Enmity [10 rounds]

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
When you take the Attack action, you can expend one use of Channel Divinity to utter a vow of enmity against a creature you can see within 30 ft. You have Advantage on attack rolls against that creature for 1 minute or until you use this feature again. 
If the creature drops to 0 HP, you can transfer the vow to a different creature within 30 ft.

embeds.title: Valcius Halcyon attacks with Azurevein!

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
**Sword of Wounding.**: When you hit a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, the target takes an extra 2d6 Necrotic damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be unable to regain Hit Points for 1 hour. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

**Radiant Strikes.**: Your strikes now carry supernatural power. When you hit a target with an attack roll using a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike, the target takes an extra 1d8 Radiant damage.

**Sap.**: If you hit a creature with Azurevein, that creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

embeds.title: Sydoris Larksson attacks with a Crystal Shortsword!

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
This magic swordâ€™s blade is fashioned from a horn or spine from a crystal dragon. When you hit with an attack roll using this sword, the target takes an extra 1d8 radiant damage.


The sword has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. When you hit a creature with an attack roll using the sword, you can expend 1 charge to regain a number of hit points equal to the extra radiant damage the sword dealt.


While youâ€™re holding the sword, you can use a bonus action to cause it to shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet, to cause it to shed dim light in a 10-foot radius, or to douse the light.

fields.value: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority die to attempt to knock the target down. You add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll, and if the target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, you knock the target prone.

embeds.title: Agatha Baratos begins to Spread the Spirit Guardians (Radiant)!

fields.name: RE3
fields.value:
**WIS Save**: 1d20 (16) + 1 = `17`; Failure!
**Damage**: 15 [magical radiant] = `15`
**Effect**: Surrounded by Spirit Guardians [9.9 minutes] (Spirit Guardians (Start of Turn); Leave Spirit Guardians; Parent: Spiritual Guardians)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.

When you cast this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it. An affected creature's speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

embeds.title: Valcius Halcyon attacks with Azurevein!

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
**Sword of Wounding.**: When you hit a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, the target takes an extra 2d6 Necrotic damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be unable to regain Hit Points for 1 hour. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

**Radiant Strikes.**: Your strikes now carry supernatural power. When you hit a target with an attack roll using a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike, the target takes an extra 1d8 Radiant damage.

**Sap.**: If you hit a creature with Azurevein, that creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

fields.name: Divine Favor
fields.value: Until the spell ends, your attacks with weapons deal an extra 1d4 Radiant damage on a hit.

fields.value: **Nick.** When you make the extra attack of the Light property, you can make it as part of the Attack action instead of as a Bonus Action. You can make this extra attack only once per turn.
